Most Illustrious and Excellent Sir

I inform you that tonight the firefighter I sent to Boa Vista has arrived and says that Bento Manuel is at Triunfo waiting for the rest of the men because he had orders from the president of the plundering to withdraw with the force and all the police to Piratini, saying that it is because of a large legal force descending from Cima da Serra; they also say that the gunboats have already been heavily fired upon; Estevão offers to administer the fort and command the piece; and if Your Excellency

God keep Your Excellency  
Camp of Picada, November 14, 1838.

Most Illustrious and Excellent Sir  
Tomás José da Silva  
Francisco Pedro de Abreu  
Major Commander of the Picada Detachment.
